post.body: 26th August, thanks Mitch :-)
I need beach sand for my wedding invites!
our day is coming to an end, hope yours is as great as ours was!
a place where a mummy goes to get all wrapped up in books. :-)
awwwww. I wanna see a pic Jodi! I got your email, will reply on Monday once Drew's back at work. :)
shame man, it hits Cam harder hey? (hugs)
mmmm, maybe if I pay her for photos? LOL!
OUCH!!!!! I have one more to edit and 6 galleries to put up and I'm done. but start shooting again on the 10th.
that doesn't sound good!
happy happy to you too! All good this side thanks, just HOT!!!!!
to everyone returning back to work tomorrow... hope it's not complete torture and that is goes by fast. xxx
p.p.s came home craving an ice cold beer and didn't have any in the fridge :(
p.s. I filled up my water bottle with sea sand, now I'm all set to make my wedding invites... *she hopes*
dogs fed, cats fed, bird fed and hamster fed. Kami busy eating too, now finally it's my turn to eat. yay!
just got home. picked up KFC! I am so sunburnt, even tho I had SPF 50 on, my feet are sore, that sand is awful! was a gr8 day tho!
On our way home. Had a great day.
Ah. Life is good.
off to the valley of waves @ suncity! xxx
that was clever.. had a post scheduled to publish in December 2009 instead of 2008. twit http://www.natashawhiteley.co.za/blog/
ah crap! Just realised my library books are 3 weeks overdue! ouch!
